title: Ep. 70 - Uranium Update with Matt Badiali and Investment Secrets from Alex Green
itunes:title: Uranium Update with Matt Badiali and Investment Secrets from Alex Green
description: S&A Resource Report Editor Matt Badiali talks about the implications of uranium following the disaster in Japan. Alex Green, Investment Director at The Oxford Club, shares his favorite investment secrets with us.
